si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence

Class OracleScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.PredictionConfidence
      • si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.OracleScore

  • public class OracleScore
extends PredictionConfidence
    Provides reliability scores on the basis of 'actual error', which is not attainable in practice, i.e., if true unlabeled data are used. The unlabeled instances provided need to have labels.
    Author:
    jurical
